member.name: T:MMB.ManagedMessageBox
member.summary: A message box component with advanced capacities

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.String)
member.param: The message text to show
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String)
member.param: The parent window that should handle the managed message box window
The message text to show
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The parent window that should handle the managed message box window
The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.param: The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
Indicate whether to show the check box or not
The default check box value if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
The check box text if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.param: The parent window that should handle the managed message box window
The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
Indicate whether to show the check box or not
The default check box value if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
The check box text if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.Control[])
member.param: The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
The font to use for message text
The color to use for message text
The background color of the message box
More control to add long side with buttons. The controls you may add will not effect the result , The result is for buttons and the check box only. This can be null to add no control.
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowQuestionMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.Control[])
member.param: The parent window that should handle the managed message box window
The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
More control to add long side with buttons. The controls you may add will not effect the result , The result is for buttons and the check box only. This can be null to add no control.
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

Indicate whether to show the check box or not
The default check box value if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
The check box text if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
member.returns: object, the button index result will be either 0 or 1 (0=yes and 1=no) with the check box result

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.Control[],MMB.ManagedMessageBoxIcon,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: The parent window that should handle the managed message box window
The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
The buttons collection to use (one button text must be presented at least)
The zero index value indicates the default button in the buttons list.
More control to add long side with buttons. The controls you may add will not effect the result , The result is for buttons and the check box only. This can be null to add no control.
The managed message box icon
Indicate whether to show the check box or not
The default check box value if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
The check box text if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
Indicate whether the message box should be right to left alignment for right to left languages like Arabic
member.returns: object includes which button clicked and the check box result.

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowMessage(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.Control[],MMB.ManagedMessageBoxIcon,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)

The managed message box icon
Indicate whether to show the check box or not
The default check box value if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
The check box text if the check box is enabled (showCheckBox = true).
member.returns: object includes which button clicked and the check box result.

member.name: M:MMB.ManagedMessageBox.ShowCustomMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Drawing.Image)
member.param: The message text to show
The message caption (title of the managed message box window)
The font to use for message text
The color to use for message text
The message box background color
The buttons collection to use (one button text must be presented at least)
The zero index value indicates the default button in the buttons list.
The managed message box icon, PNG format image is recommended
member.returns: object includes which button clicked and the check box result.
